commits.author: Stefan Daschek
commits.body:
This functionality has been extracted into its own bundle: https://github.com/noniq/Markdown-MathJax.tmbundle

See https://github.com/textmate/bundle-support.tmbundle/pull/19#issuecomment-237811387 ff. for rationale.

commits.author: Stefan Daschek
commits.summary: If project directory is set, use it as working directory.
commits.body: This allows to use project-specific Markdown processors: If you have for example a Ruby project using the Redcarpet gem, you can now set `TM_MARKDOWN` to `bundle exec redcarpet` (optionally specifying additional command line options for configuration) in the project’s `.tm_properties` to use this exact version of Redcarpet for the preview command.

commits.author: windwiny
commits.summary: Preview of an untitled document would fail
commits.body: Calling File.exists? with a nil parameter is not supported.

commits.author: Stefan Daschek
commits.summary: Convert Preview command to use TextMate::Markdown
commits.body:
See http://lists.macromates.com/textmate/2016-July/039723.html for rationale. This rewrite should behave exactly like the previous version of the command.

Using `TextMate::Markdown` seems like a perfect fit, and it is easy to extend this code to support the `TM_MARKDOWN_FILTER` (as discussed on the mailing list).

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Include default typing pairs when used with selection
commits.body: This was mistakenly augmenting the list of quotes from raw/links rather than the standard default typing pairs. Now includes the defaults with the sole addition of '' quotes.

commits.author: Martin Kühl
commits.body:
This change makes the `Raw` command structurally
more similar to the commands `Bold` and `Italic`.

In addition, this fixes a problem where invoking the `Raw` command
over a word using a keyboard shortcut would leave the caret before
the trailing ` instead of after it
(which is where both `Bold` and `Italic` leave it).
